page.title: 02LOCAL FARMS
page.content: {LOCAL FARMS The main feature in our twelve km. area is that it is mostly{farm land. The farms in our area are{Eastfield, {Luggate,Overfield,Papple,Pressmennan, {Ruchlaw Mains,Ruchlaw West Mains, {Whittingehame and Yarrow. { }Most of the farms are arable farms and when we compared our interviews we found that our answers were very similar.For instance all the farmers believed in conservation and agreed that East Lothian has good soil.They all said that it was one of the best areas to farm in Scotland and that arable farming is more suitable for this area.The acres that the farmers owned varied between{265 acres and 365 {acres.}The number of employees varied from one to fourteen workers.
